title: Second Foundation
synopsis: As the Mule's power grows, the remaining members of the Foundation search for the mysterious Second Foundation, a group of psychohistorians who manipulate minds rather than physical events.

title: Warbreaker
synopsis: Two princesses are caught in a political and magical conflict between two kingdoms, where color and breath are used as forms of magic.

title: Somewhere in Time
synopsis: A playwright becomes obsessed with a vintage photograph of a 19th-century actress, and uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time to meet her, which then leads to a tragic end.

title: The Da Vinci Code
synopsis: Robert Langdon investigates a murder at the Louvre Museum and uncovers a conspiracy involving the Priory of Sion, the Knights Templar, and the true nature of the Holy Grail.

title: Dandelion Wine
synopsis: A semi-autobiographical novel that captures the magic and wonder of childhood during a summer in a small Illinois town in 1928, exploring themes of memory, nostalgia, and the passage of time.

title: The Mystery Knight
synopsis: The third novella in the Dunk and Egg series, as they become involved in a mystery at a wedding.

title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
synopsis: A poor boy named Charlie Bucket wins a golden ticket to tour the mysterious chocolate factory of Willy Wonka, encountering fantastical treats and eccentric characters.

title: Night of the Living Dummy
synopsis: Twin sisters discover a ventriloquist dummy that comes to life and wreaks havoc, revealing a dark and malevolent nature.

title: The Last Man
synopsis: Set in the late 21st century, this novel depicts a future world ravaged by a plague that decimates humanity, focusing on the experiences of the last survivor.

title: Maybe Someday
synopsis: Sydney and Ridge form a unique bond through music, exploring themes of love, betrayal, and second chances.

title: The Secret of Secrets
synopsis: Robert Langdon journeys from Prague to New York to London as he evades a would-be assassin and ponders the depths of human consciousness.

title: Murder in Mesopotamia
synopsis: A nurse caring for an archaeologist's wife in Iraq finds herself caught up in a murder investigation when the wife is found dead.

title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
synopsis: Harry's third year at Hogwarts is marked by the escape of Sirius Black, a dangerous wizard, from the wizarding prison of Azkaban, and the introduction of the terrifying Dementors.

title: The Cuckoo's Calling
synopsis: The first book in the Cormoran Strike detective series, featuring a war veteran turned private investigator who investigates the suspicious death of a supermodel.

title: The Witches
synopsis: A young boy and his grandmother uncover a convention of witches disguised as ordinary women and must find a way to stop their evil plans.

title: Danny, the Champion of the World
synopsis: Danny and his father, William, share a close bond and a passion for poaching pheasants. They devise a clever plan to outsmart the cruel and wealthy Victor Hazell.

title: Fifty Shades of Grey
synopsis: The sexually charged relationship between college graduate Anastasia Steele and billionaire Christian Grey, exploring themes of BDSM and dominance/submission.

title: Twilight
synopsis: The forbidden romance between Bella Swan, a human teenager, and Edward Cullen, a vampire, set against a backdrop of supernatural danger and ancient rivalries.

title: Heart Bones
synopsis: Beyah and Samson form a connection over a summer, both carrying their own burdens and secrets.

title: The Murder on the Links
synopsis: Hercule Poirot investigates the murder of a man found dead on a golf course in France, uncovering a complex web of relationships and hidden motives.

title: You Only Live Twice
synopsis: James Bond travels to Japan to avenge the death of his wife and stop Blofeld's plan to start a war between the United States and the Soviet Union.

title: The Memoirs of Sherlock Holmes
synopsis: A collection of eleven short stories featuring Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson, including some of their most famous cases.

title: The Case-Book of Sherlock Holmes
synopsis: A collection of twelve short stories featuring Sherlock Holmes's later cases.

title: The Diamond Age: Or, A Young Lady's Illustrated Primer
synopsis: In a future where nanotechnology and distributed manufacturing have transformed society, a young girl named Nell is given a powerful, interactive educational device that guides her through life.

title: The Hobbit
synopsis: Bilbo Baggins, a comfortable hobbit, is thrust into an adventure by the wizard Gandalf and a company of dwarves, who seek to reclaim their stolen treasure from the dragon Smaug.

title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
synopsis: Harry Potter, an orphan, discovers on his eleventh birthday that he is a wizard and is invited to attend Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, where he learns about magic and his own mysterious past.

title: Fire & Blood
synopsis: A historical account of the Targaryen dynasty's reign over Westeros, from Aegon the Conqueror to the regency of Aegon III.

title: The Sworn Sword
synopsis: The second novella in the Dunk and Egg series, continuing their adventures and exploring the political landscape of Westeros.

title: The Mystery of the Sea
synopsis: A complex tale of espionage, lost treasure, and supernatural elements, set against the backdrop of the Napoleonic Wars.

title: Carrie
synopsis: A bullied and abused teenage girl discovers she has telekinetic powers, leading to a terrifying and destructive act of revenge.

title: The Lucky One
synopsis: Logan, a Marine veteran, searches for the woman in a photograph he found during his time in Iraq, believing she is his good luck charm.

title: The Host
synopsis: In a future where alien parasites inhabit human bodies, a young woman named Melanie Stryder resists the control of her alien consciousness and fights for love and survival.

title: Reminders of Him
synopsis: Kenna Rowan, after serving time in prison for a tragic mistake, returns to her town to reunite with her four-year-old son, facing obstacles and finding unexpected connections.

title: Too Late
synopsis: A dark romance involving Sloan, Carter, and Asa, exploring complex relationships and dangerous situations.

title: Gone Girl
synopsis: On their fifth wedding anniversary, Nick Dunne discovers his wife Amy has disappeared. As the police investigate, Nick becomes the prime suspect, and the truth about their seemingly perfect marriage unravels.

title: Dr. No
synopsis: James Bond travels to Jamaica to investigate the disappearance of a British agent and uncovers a plot involving a reclusive scientist and his island fortress.

title: For Your Eyes Only
synopsis: A collection of short stories featuring James Bond on various missions, showcasing his skills and resourcefulness.

title: Thunderball
synopsis: James Bond races against time to recover stolen nuclear warheads from the criminal organization SPECTRE.

title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
synopsis: A collection of thirteen short stories featuring Sherlock Holmes's return after his supposed death, as he and Dr. Watson solve new mysteries.

title: Children of Dune
synopsis: Paul Atreides' children, Leto II and Ghanima, possess prescient abilities. They navigate the complex political landscape and the legacy of their father, as the future of Dune and the spice hangs in the balance.

title: Something Wicked This Way Comes
synopsis: Two 13-year-old boys discover the dark secrets of a mysterious traveling carnival that arrives in their small town, and they must confront the sinister forces at play.

title: Fall; or, Dodge in Hell
synopsis: A man's digital consciousness survives his death, leading to the creation of a virtual afterlife and the exploration of the nature of consciousness and reality.

title: The Fellowship of the Ring
synopsis: Frodo Baggins inherits the One Ring, an artifact of immense power, and embarks on a perilous journey with a fellowship of companions to destroy it and prevent the Dark Lord Sauron from conquering Middle-earth.

title: The Running Grave
synopsis: The seventh book in the Cormoran Strike detective series, Strike and Robin investigate a dangerous cult in Norfolk.

title: A Feast for Crows
synopsis: Following the chaos of the war, the Seven Kingdoms struggle to rebuild, and new players emerge to seize power, while the threat from beyond the Wall continues to grow.

title: The Hedge Knight
synopsis: A novella set in the world of A Song of Ice and Fire, following the adventures of Dunk, a hedge knight, and his squire Egg.

title: Shadows of Self
synopsis: The second book in the Wax and Wayne series, continuing the adventures of Waxillium Ladrian and his partner Wayne as they investigate a series of murders.

title: The Frugal Wizard's Handbook for Surviving Medieval England
synopsis: A standalone novel outside the Cosmere, featuring a man who wakes up in medieval England with no memory of his past.

title: It
synopsis: A group of childhood friends reunite as adults to confront a shape-shifting evil entity that terrorizes their small town, feeding on their fears.

title: Doctor Sleep
synopsis: Dan Torrance, the grown-up Danny from The Shining, faces a group of psychic vampires who prey on children with the shining.

title: Northanger Abbey
synopsis: Catherine Morland, a young and naive woman obsessed with Gothic novels, navigates the social scene in Bath and learns to distinguish between reality and fiction, finding love and maturity along the way.

title: The Rescue
synopsis: Denise, a single mother, is rescued from a car accident by Taylor, a volunteer fireman with a troubled past, and their growing connection as they confront their emotional scars.

title: The Longest Ride
synopsis: Two intertwined love stories: Sophia and Luke, a bull rider, and Ira and Ruth, an elderly couple reflecting on their decades-long romance.

title: The Sign of Four
synopsis: Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson are hired to investigate the disappearance of a man and the theft of a valuable treasure, leading them on a thrilling chase through London and beyond.

title: Dune
synopsis: On the desert planet Arrakis, also known as Dune, a precious substance called melange ('spice') is the most valuable commodity in the galaxy. The noble House Atreides is betrayed and must fight for survival against their enemies, the Harkonnens, and the harsh environment.

title: Dune Messiah
synopsis: Twelve years after the events of Dune, Paul Atreides reigns as Emperor. He struggles with the burden of his prescience and the political and religious forces that threaten his rule and the future of the spice.

title: Cryptonomicon
synopsis: A sprawling epic that weaves together two timelines: World War II codebreakers working to crack enemy ciphers, and modern-day hackers seeking to establish a digital data haven.

title: A Clash of Kings
synopsis: The war for the Iron Throne intensifies as the Seven Kingdoms are plunged into chaos, with multiple claimants vying for power and ancient magic resurfacing.

title: Mistborn: The Well of Ascension
synopsis: Following the overthrow of the Lord Ruler, Vin and the rebels struggle to maintain order and face new threats, while the nature of the Well of Ascension is revealed.

title: Rhythm of War
synopsis: The fourth book in the Stormlight Archive, focusing on Navani Kholin and her scientific endeavors, and the ongoing war against the fused.

title: The Shining
synopsis: A family becomes isolated in a haunted hotel during the winter, where the father descends into madness and violence, influenced by supernatural forces.

title: The Dead Zone
synopsis: A man who gains psychic abilities after a car accident must confront a dangerous politician with a dark future.

title: It Starts With Us
synopsis: The sequel to 'It Ends With Us', continuing the story of Lily, Ryle, and Atlas.

title: Sharp Objects
synopsis: Camille Preaker, a journalist with a troubled past, returns to her small hometown to investigate the murders of two young girls. As she delves into the case, she confronts her own demons and the dark secrets of her family.

title: His Last Bow
synopsis: A collection of eight short stories featuring Sherlock Holmes, including his final case, set on the eve of World War I.

title: The Lost World
synopsis: Four years after the Jurassic Park incident, rumors of a second island with surviving dinosaurs surface. Dr. Ian Malcolm joins an expedition to this 'Site B' and discovers the dangers of interfering with nature's course.

title: Seveneves
synopsis: When the Moon unexpectedly explodes, humanity faces extinction. A desperate plan is hatched to send a select few into space to ensure the survival of the species.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
synopsis: In his second year at Hogwarts, Harry faces new dangers as a mysterious chamber is opened, unleashing a sinister force that petrifies students.

title: Lethal White
synopsis: The fourth book in the Cormoran Strike detective series, Strike and Robin investigate a complex case involving blackmail and murder.

title: The Way of Kings
synopsis: The first book in the Stormlight Archive series, set on the war-torn world of Roshar, where ancient magic and powerful storms shape the lives of its inhabitants.

title: The Alloy of Law
synopsis: Set 300 years after the original Mistborn trilogy, this book introduces Waxillium Ladrian, a lawman with Allomantic and Feruchemical abilities, in a world transitioning to a more modern era.

title: The Lost Metal
synopsis: The fourth and final Wax and Wayne book, bringing the series to a conclusion.

title: Fantastic Mr Fox
synopsis: A clever fox named Mr. Fox outsmarts three mean farmers, Boggis, Bunce, and Bean, who try to capture him after he steals their livestock.

title: Pet Sematary
synopsis: A family discovers a burial ground with the power to resurrect the dead, leading to tragic consequences and a descent into horror.

title: Revival
synopsis: A dark and disturbing tale of faith, addiction, and the terrifying consequences of scientific hubris.

title: Fairy Tale
synopsis: A teenager who inherits the keys to a terrifying other world, where good and evil are at war.

title: A Walk to Remember
synopsis: The unlikely romance between Landon, a rebellious teenager, and Jamie, a devout and terminally ill girl, and the transformative power of their love.

title: Midnight Sun
synopsis: The events of Twilight, retold from Edward Cullen's perspective.

title: Verity
synopsis: A struggling writer, Lowen Ashleigh, accepts the job of completing a book series by a famous authorId, Verity Crawford, and uncovers shocking secrets within the Crawford household.

title: Regretting You
synopsis: Morgan and Clara's relationship is tested when secrets are revealed, leading to a journey of self-discovery and forgiveness.

title: Origin
synopsis: Robert Langdon travels to Spain to attend a presentation by a former student, a futurist who has made a groundbreaking discovery that challenges the foundations of religion.

title: The Murder of Roger Ackroyd
synopsis: In a quiet English village, a widow dies of a drug overdose, and her fiancé, Roger Ackroyd, is murdered. Hercule Poirot investigates, uncovering blackmail and shocking secrets.

title: The Big Four
synopsis: Hercule Poirot and Captain Hastings confront a global criminal organization known as the Big Four, who are plotting to take over the world.

title: Foundation and Earth
synopsis: Golan Trevize continues his search for Earth, the legendary origin of humanity, as he tries to understand the true nature of Gaia and its role in the galaxy's future.

title: Fahrenheit 451
synopsis: In a dystopian future where books are banned and burned, a fireman named Guy Montag begins to question his role in enforcing this censorship and seeks knowledge and freedom.

title: Snow Crash
synopsis: In a near-future Los Angeles, a pizza delivery driver and hacker named Hiro Protagonist investigates a dangerous new computer virus that threatens both the virtual reality world of the Metaverse and the real world.

title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
synopsis: Harry is unexpectedly chosen to compete in the Triwizard Tournament, a dangerous magical competition, and faces new challenges and the return of a dark enemy.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
synopsis: Harry and his friends embark on a dangerous quest to find and destroy Voldemort's Horcruxes, while the final battle between good and evil looms.

title: Salem's Lot
synopsis: A writer returns to his childhood town and discovers it has been overrun by vampires, leading to a fight for survival against the undead.

title: Hell House
synopsis: A group of paranormal investigators spend a week in the infamous 'Hell House,' a supposedly haunted mansion with a dark and violent history, encountering terrifying supernatural phenomena.

title: Persuasion
synopsis: Anne Elliot, at twenty-seven and single, gets a second chance at love with Captain Frederick Wentworth, whom she was persuaded to reject years before. They navigate changed circumstances to see if they can find love again.

title: Fifty Shades Darker
synopsis: Anastasia and Christian attempt to rekindle their relationship, facing challenges from Christian's past and their own personal demons.

title: Dear John
synopsis: The long-distance love story of John, a soldier, and Savannah, a college student, and the challenges they face due to war and separation.

title: The Mystery of the Blue Train
synopsis: A glamorous train journey turns deadly when a wealthy heiress is murdered, and her jewels are stolen. Hercule Poirot investigates the passengers, each with their own secrets and motives.

title: Children of Húrin
synopsis: The tragic tale of Túrin Turambar, a mortal hero, and his cursed family during the First Age of Middle-earth, as they battle against the forces of Morgoth.

title: A Game of Thrones
synopsis: In the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros, political intrigue and betrayal erupt as noble families vie for power, while a looming threat from beyond the Wall grows stronger.

title: A Dance with Dragons
synopsis: As the war continues, Daenerys Targaryen struggles to maintain control in the East, while Jon Snow faces challenges at the Wall, and Tyrion Lannister navigates the treacherous politics of Essos.

title: Words of Radiance
synopsis: The second book in the Stormlight Archive, continuing the stories of Kaladin, Shallan, and Dalinar as they face new challenges and uncover the secrets of the Knights Radiant.

title: Matilda
synopsis: A brilliant young girl with telekinetic powers, Matilda Wormwood, uses her abilities to overcome her neglectful parents and tyrannical headmistress.

title: Sense and Sensibility
synopsis: The story of two sisters and their search for love, a home and security. Elinor is the sensible and responsible one, Marianne is emotional and impulsive. Elinor loves a man who is promised to another woman, Marianne loses her heart to a scoundrel who jilts her.

title: The Mister
synopsis: A wealthy British aristocrat falls for his Albanian housekeeper, leading to a passionate and dangerous affair.

title: Message in a Bottle
synopsis: Theresa, a divorced mother, finds a love letter in a bottle washed ashore, leading her on a journey to find its authorId, Garrett, a grieving widower.

title: Safe Haven
synopsis: Katie, a woman with a mysterious past, seeks refuge in a small town and finds love with Alex, a widowed store owner, while confronting the dangers that threaten her.

title: Angels & Demons
synopsis: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is drawn into a conflict between an ancient secret society, the Illuminati, and the Catholic Church when a physicist is murdered and a bomb threatens Vatican City.

title: Inferno
synopsis: Robert Langdon awakens in a hospital in Florence with amnesia and must decipher clues related to Dante's Inferno to stop a global pandemic.

title: Casino Royale
synopsis: James Bond is sent to bankrupt a Russian operative in a high-stakes poker game at the Casino Royale in France, facing danger and betrayal.

title: Octopussy and The Living Daylights
synopsis: A collection of short stories featuring James Bond on various missions.

title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
synopsis: A collection of twelve short stories featuring Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson solving a variety of mysteries, showcasing Holmes's deductive reasoning and eccentric personality.

title: Heretics of Dune
synopsis: Centuries after Leto II's death, the Bene Gesserit face new threats from the Scattering, as humans return from beyond the reach of the old Empire. The spice is still vital, and new factions vie for control.

title: Troubled Blood
synopsis: The fifth book in the Cormoran Strike detective series, Strike and Robin investigate the disappearance of a doctor decades earlier.

title: A Storm of Swords
synopsis: The war reaches a bloody climax as alliances shift, betrayals abound, and the fate of Westeros hangs in the balance.

title: The Bands of Mourning
synopsis: The third book in the Wax and Wayne series, focusing on the search for the legendary Bands of Mourning and the mysteries surrounding them.

title: The Lady of the Shroud
synopsis: A man inherits a mysterious castle in the Balkans and becomes entangled in a web of intrigue, supernatural occurrences, and a beautiful, enigmatic woman.

title: Billy Summers
synopsis: While not strictly horror, it contains very dark elements. A hitman looking for one last job, finds himself in a very dangerous situation.

title: Frankenstein
synopsis: Victor Frankenstein, a young scientist, creates a grotesque but sentient creature in a scientific experiment. The creature, rejected by society, seeks revenge on its creator, leading to a tragic and horrifying confrontation.

title: New Moon
synopsis: Bella struggles with Edward's departure and finds solace in her friendship with Jacob Black, a werewolf, while navigating the complexities of their supernatural world.

title: Breaking Dawn
synopsis: Bella and Edward's marriage and the consequences of their union, including the birth of their half-vampire child and the escalating conflict with the Volturi.

title: The Lost Symbol
synopsis: Robert Langdon is summoned to Washington, D.C., to decipher a series of symbols connected to Freemasonry and uncover a dangerous secret hidden within the city's landmarks.

title: Goldfinger
synopsis: James Bond investigates a gold smuggler named Auric Goldfinger and uncovers a plot to rob Fort Knox.

title: Foundation and Empire
synopsis: The Foundation faces the rise of the Mule, a powerful psychic mutant who threatens to destroy Seldon's carefully laid plans. The Foundation must adapt and survive against an unpredictable force.

title: Foundation's Edge
synopsis: Centuries after the Mule's defeat, Golan Trevize, a councilman, is tasked with choosing between the First Foundation, the Second Foundation, and Gaia, a planet with a collective consciousness, to determine the future of humanity.

title: The Silmarillion
synopsis: A collection of myths and legends that chronicle the creation of Middle-earth, the history of the Elves, and the ancient struggles against the first Dark Lord, Morgoth.

title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
synopsis: As the wizarding world denies the return of Voldemort, Harry and his friends form a secret group, Dumbledore's Army, to prepare for the coming war.

title: Career of Evil
synopsis: The third book in the Cormoran Strike detective series, Strike and Robin investigate a series of disturbing crimes linked to their past.

title: Elantris
synopsis: In the city of Elantris, once filled with godlike beings, a mysterious event transforms its inhabitants into powerless, decaying creatures, and a prince tries to uncover the truth.

title: Cujo
synopsis: A rabid St. Bernard terrorizes a mother and her young son, trapping them in a car and forcing them to confront the terrifying animal.

title: Emma
synopsis: Centers on Emma Woodhouse, a wealthy, pretty, self-satisfied young woman who indulges herself with meddlesome and unsuccessful attempts at matchmaking among her friends and neighbors. She eventually finds her own destiny in marriage.

title: Freed: Fifty Shades Freed as Told by Christian
synopsis: The third book of the Fifty Shades trilogy retold from Christian Grey's perspective.

title: From Russia, with Love
synopsis: James Bond is lured into a trap by the Russian counterintelligence agency SMERSH, who plan to assassinate him and discredit British intelligence.

title: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
synopsis: James Bond infiltrates the mountain lair of Ernst Stavro Blofeld, the head of SPECTRE, and falls in love with a woman named Tracy di Vicenzo.

title: God Emperor of Dune
synopsis: Thousands of years later, Leto II has transformed himself into a human-sandworm hybrid, ruling as the God Emperor. His tyrannical reign, known as the Golden Path, is a long-term plan to ensure humanity's survival, but its cost is immense.

title: The Martian Chronicles
synopsis: A series of loosely connected stories chronicling humanity's colonization of Mars and the resulting clash between human and Martian civilizations.

title: Anathem
synopsis: Set in a world where intellectuals live in secluded monastic communities, a young mathematician named Erasmus becomes involved in a cosmic mystery that threatens the very fabric of reality.

title: The Two Towers
synopsis: The Fellowship is broken, and Frodo and Sam continue their journey towards Mordor, while Aragorn, Legolas, and Gimli pursue the captured hobbits, Merry and Pippin, and face the growing forces of Sauron.

title: Oathbringer
synopsis: The third book in the Stormlight Archive, focusing on Dalinar's past and the growing threat of the Voidbringers as the war for Roshar intensifies.

title: The Haunted Mask
synopsis: A young girl buys a terrifying mask for Halloween, only to find that it has fused to her face and is changing her into something sinister.

title: Pride and Prejudice
synopsis: Describes the clash between Elizabeth Bennet, the daughter of a country gentleman, and Fitzwilliam Darcy, a rich and aristocratic landowner. They must overcome their pride and prejudice to find love and self-understanding.

title: Mansfield Park
synopsis: Fanny Price, a poor relation, is brought up in the Bertram household. She faces challenges and demonstrates moral strength, eventually winning acceptance and finding love with Edmund Bertram.

title: Jurassic Park
synopsis: Billionaire John Hammond creates a wildlife park on a remote island populated by cloned dinosaurs. When a power outage unleashes the prehistoric creatures, a group of scientists and Hammond's grandchildren must fight for survival.

title: Jurassic World
synopsis: Twenty-two years after the events of Jurassic Park, a fully functioning dinosaur theme park, Jurassic World, exists on Isla Nublar. When a genetically modified hybrid dinosaur escapes, chaos ensues, and the park's staff and visitors are in danger.

title: Tress of the Emerald Sea
synopsis: A standalone novel in the Cosmere, featuring Tress as she travels across the deadly emerald sea to save her love.

title: The BFG
synopsis: A young orphan named Sophie is kidnapped by the Big Friendly Giant (BFG), who takes her to Giant Country, where they work together to stop the evil, child-eating giants.

title: Dracula
synopsis: Count Dracula, a centuries-old vampire, seeks to spread his undead curse from Transylvania to England, encountering resistance from a group of determined individuals.

title: Christine
synopsis: A possessed 1958 Plymouth Fury terrorizes a teenage boy and his town, fueled by a malevolent force.

title: Later
synopsis: A boy with the ability to see and speak to the dead becomes entangled in a dangerous investigation.

title: Fifty Shades Freed
synopsis: Anastasia and Christian navigate married life, confronting new obstacles and threats to their relationship.

title: See Me
synopsis: Colin, a man with a troubled past, and Maria, a successful lawyer, find love while battling the demons that threaten to tear them apart.

title: Ugly Love
synopsis: Tate and Miles engage in a no-strings-attached relationship based on attraction, but their emotional walls are tested as they develop deeper feelings.

title: Moonraker
synopsis: James Bond investigates a wealthy industrialist suspected of cheating at cards and discovers a plot involving a nuclear missile.

title: The Hound of the Baskervilles
synopsis: Sherlock Holmes is called to Dartmoor to investigate the legend of a demonic hound that is believed to be responsible for the deaths of the Baskerville family.

title: The Valley of Fear
synopsis: Sherlock Holmes investigates a murder at a remote English manor house, uncovering a conspiracy that stretches across the Atlantic to a secret society in America.

title: Chapterhouse: Dune
synopsis: The Bene Gesserit retreat to their matriarchal planet Chapterhouse, as they are pursued by a mysterious enemy. They continue their breeding program and seek to ensure the survival of their order and the special abilities they possess.

title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
synopsis: Harry discovers a mysterious potions textbook and learns more about Voldemort's past, while the wizarding world prepares for the final battle.

title: The Ink Black Heart
synopsis: The sixth book in the Cormoran Strike detective series, Strike and Robin investigate the murder of a co-creator of a popular cartoon.

title: The Lair of the White Worm
synopsis: A mysterious and seductive woman with a dark secret resides in a remote English countryside, where a monstrous creature lurks beneath the surface.

title: Welcome to Dead House
synopsis: A family moves into a creepy old house in the town of Dark Falls, where they discover a dark secret and encounter malevolent ghosts.

title: I Am Legend
synopsis: Robert Neville is the last human survivor in a world overrun by vampire-like creatures, struggling to survive and find a cure while battling loneliness and despair.

title: The Shrinking Man
synopsis: After being exposed to a mysterious radioactive mist, Scott Carey begins to shrink, facing increasing dangers and existential dread as his world becomes a terrifyingly large place.

title: What Dreams May Come
synopsis: After dying, Chris Nielsen journeys through a vivid and surreal afterlife, searching for his wife who committed suicide, and confronting the nature of love, loss, and the boundaries of reality.

title: The Notebook
synopsis: An enduring love story between Allie and Noah, told through their memories and a shared journal, spanning decades of separation and reunion.

title: The Best of Me
synopsis: Amanda and Dawson, former high school sweethearts from opposite sides of the tracks, are brought back together after many years, forcing them to confront their past and the choices they made.

title: November 9
synopsis: Fallon and Ben meet every November 9th for five years, their lives and feelings evolving with each encounter.

title: The Mysterious Affair at Styles
synopsis: Hercule Poirot investigates the poisoning of a wealthy woman at a country estate, uncovering a complex web of family secrets and rivalries.

title: A Study in Scarlet
synopsis: The first Sherlock Holmes novel, introducing the brilliant detective and his loyal companion Dr. Watson as they investigate a mysterious murder in London.

title: Foundation
synopsis: A group of scientists, led by Hari Seldon, foresee the fall of the Galactic Empire and establish the Foundation to shorten the coming dark age. They use psychohistory, a statistical science, to predict and manipulate the future.

title: Prelude to Foundation
synopsis: The early life of Hari Seldon on Trantor, and the development of psychohistory. It describes the beginning of the foundation project, and the political and social issues that lead to it.

title: Forward the Foundation
synopsis: The later life of Hari Seldon, detailing the struggles to perfect psychohistory and establish the Foundations, and his interactions with R. Daneel Olivaw.

title: The Illustrated Man
synopsis: A collection of short stories connected by a man whose body is covered in living tattoos that reveal visions of the future and the human condition.

title: Termination Shock
synopsis: A near-future thriller exploring the consequences of climate change and geoengineering, as a group of individuals attempt to take control of the planet's destiny.

title: The Return of the King
synopsis: The final battle for Middle-earth unfolds as Frodo and Sam reach Mount Doom, and Aragorn leads the armies of men against Sauron's forces, culminating in the destruction of the One Ring and the end of the War of the Ring.

title: The Silkworm
synopsis: The second book in the Cormoran Strike detective series, Strike investigates the disappearance of a controversial novelist.

title: Mistborn: The Final Empire
synopsis: In a world ruled by a tyrannical Lord Ruler, a street thief named Vin joins a rebellion to overthrow him, using the power of Allomancy, a magic system based on metals.

title: Mistborn: The Hero of Ages
synopsis: The world is plunged into chaos as the Deepness threatens to destroy everything. Vin and her allies must make difficult choices to save humanity and understand the true purpose of the Hero of Ages.

title: Yumi and the Nightmare Painter
synopsis: A standalone novel in the Cosmere, featuring a painter and a spirit binder, linked by a mysterious force.

title: The Jewel of Seven Stars
synopsis: An archaeologist's daughter becomes possessed by the spirit of an ancient Egyptian queen, leading to a suspenseful battle between life and death, and ancient magic.

title: Misery
synopsis: A famous authorId is held captive by an obsessive fan who forces him to rewrite his latest book, leading to a psychological and physical battle for survival.

title: Grey: Fifty Shades of Grey as Told by Christian
synopsis: The first book of the Fifty Shades trilogy retold from Christian Grey's perspective.

title: Darker: Fifty Shades Darker as Told by Christian
synopsis: The second book of the Fifty Shades trilogy retold from Christian Grey's perspective.

title: It Ends With Us
synopsis: Lily Bloom navigates a new relationship with Ryle Kincaid, while also confronting her past and the cycle of abuse.

title: Poirot Investigates
synopsis: A collection of short stories featuring Hercule Poirot as he solves a variety of mysteries involving greed, jealousy, and revenge.

title: The Man with the Golden Gun
synopsis: James Bond is sent to Jamaica to assassinate Francisco Scaramanga, a notorious hitman with a golden gun.

title: James and the Giant Peach
synopsis: An orphaned boy named James Henry Trotter escapes his cruel aunts by entering a giant, magical peach that takes him on a fantastical journey with talking insects.

title: The Stand
synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by a deadly plague, survivors are drawn into a battle between good and evil, represented by two powerful figures.

title: One Day at HorrorLand
synopsis: A family's road trip takes a terrifying turn when they stumble upon a sinister amusement park filled with monsters and deadly games.

title: Say Cheese and Die!
synopsis: A group of friends find an old camera that takes pictures that predict terrifying events, leading to a series of deadly encounters.

title: Eclipse
synopsis: Bella is forced to choose between her love for Edward and her friendship with Jacob as a dangerous vampire threat looms.

title: Dark Places
synopsis: Libby Day, the sole survivor of a massacre that killed her family when she was a child, is forced to confront her past when a secret society seeks her help in uncovering the truth about the crime.

title: Live and Let Die
synopsis: James Bond investigates a series of murders linked to a gold smuggling operation in Harlem and Jamaica, encountering voodoo and powerful criminals.

title: Diamonds Are Forever
synopsis: James Bond goes undercover to infiltrate a diamond smuggling ring, traveling from Sierra Leone to Las Vegas.

title: The Spy Who Loved Me
synopsis: Told from the perspective of a young woman named Vivienne Michel, James Bond protects her from a group of gangsters at a remote motel.
